unnormalised: Hey, has anyone taken the Mumbai to Goa ferry recently? I'm thinking of booking tickets for the 15/12/2024 sailing. Is the Rs. 6000 price worth it? Heard the views are amazing, but the 14-hour journey seems long. Also, anyone know if they serve chai and snacks on board? Need my fix!
normalised: Hey, has anyone taken the Mumbai to Goa ferry recently? I'm thinking of booking tickets for the fifteenth December two thousand and twenty four sailing. Is the rupee six thousand price worth it? Heard the views are amazing, but the fourteen hour journey seems long. Also, anyone know if they serve chai and snacks on board? Need my fix!
